description:
Armed with the Dragon Radar, Gohan and Krillin recover the seven Dragon Balls from their hiding places.  But before they can summon the Eternal Dragon to make their wish, they are confronted by a powerful new enemy - Goku?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dede yo Super Shenron!! Boku no Negai o Kanae Tamae
Les sept boules de cristal enfin retrouvées
Saia daí Shenlong! E realize o meu desejo!
ออกมาเถิดซูเปอร์เทพมังกร!! ทำให้พรของพวกเราเป็นจริงด้วย
出でよ超神龍!! ボクの願いをかなえたまえ
